title: Red Hot Poetry (feat. Mike Vecchione & Andy Fiori)
description:
Andy Fiori and Mike Vecchione join The Bonfire! The guys talk about Jussie Smollet's return to the red carpet at the 2022 BET Awards. Andy Fiori tells the gang he cheated in school by passing off Red Hot Chili Pepper Lyrics as his on poetry.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com

@ComicMikeV www.MikeVecchione.com

@AndyFiori www.AndyFiori.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Andy fiori, mike vecchione)
